verses.verse: Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> after <S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2674>Hazor;<s%> and the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of his <S%H6635>army<s%> was <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in Harosheth-hagoyim.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for he had <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and he <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2394>severely<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
Now <S%H1683>Deborah,<s%> a <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3941>Lappidoth,<s%> was <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at that <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And she used to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8560>palm<s%> <S%H8560>tree<s%> of <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to her for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Now she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>summoned<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> from <S%H5321>Kedesh-naphtali,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3808>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H1980>'Go<s%> and <S%H4900>march<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> with you <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Naphtali and from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

'And I will <S%H4900>draw<s%> out to you <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of Jabin's <S%H6635>army,<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H1995>many<s%> [troops] to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> him into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>' "

Then <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H518>"If<s%> you will <S%H1980>go<s%> with me, then I will <S%H1980>go;<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H1980>go<s%> with me, I will not <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H1980>surely<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> with you; <S%H657>nevertheless,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H8597>honor<s%> shall not be yours on the <S%H1870>journey<s%> that you are about to <S%H1980>take,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H802>woman.<s%>" Then <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> with <S%H1301>Barak<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh.<s%>

And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> <S%H2199>together<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with him; <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> also <S%H5927>went<s%> up with him.

Now <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%> had <S%H6504>separated<s%> himself from the <S%H9515>Kenites,<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2246>Hobab<s%> the father-in-law of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> away as the <S%H436>oak<s%> in <S%H6815>Zaanannim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H854>near<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh.<s%>
Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> that <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> had <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>

And <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2199>together<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him, from Harosheth-hagoyim to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon.<s%>

And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1301>Barak,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise!<s%> For <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> <S%H3808>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3318>gone<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you." So <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H310>following<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2000>routed<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [his] <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [his] <S%H4264>army,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1301>Barak;<s%> and <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H3381>alighted<s%> from [his] <S%H4818>chariot<s%> and <S%H5127>fled<s%> away on <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

But <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and the <S%H4264>army<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Harosheth-hagoyim, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> not <S%H5704>even<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H7604>left.<s%>

Now <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> away on <S%H7272>foot<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite,<s%> for [there was] <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite.<s%>

And <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5493>"Turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside,<s%> my <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to me! Do not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>" And he <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to her into the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and she <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with a <S%H8063>rug.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H8248>give<s%> me a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> for I am <S%H6770>thirsty.<s%>" So she <S%H6605>opened<s%> a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H8248>gave<s%> him a <S%H8248>drink;<s%> then she <S%H3680>covered<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H5975>"Stand<s%> in the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and it shall be <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H7592>inquires<s%> of you, and <S%H559>says,<s%> 'Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%>?' that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H369>'No.<s%>'"

But <S%H3278>Jael,<s%> Heber's <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H3489>peg<s%> and <S%H7760>seized<s%> a <S%H4717>hammer<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3909>secretly<s%> to him and <S%H8628>drove<s%> the <S%H3489>peg<s%> into his <S%H7541>temple,<s%> and it <S%H6795>went<s%> <S%H6795>through<s%> into the <S%H776>ground;<s%> for he was <S%H7290>sound<s%> <S%H7290>asleep<s%> and <S%H5888>exhausted.<s%> So he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> as <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>"Come,<s%> and I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you are <S%H1245>seeking.<s%>" And he <S%H935>entered<s%> with her, and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> was <S%H5307>lying<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> with the <S%H3489>tent<s%> <S%H3489>peg<s%> in his <S%H7541>temple.<s%>
So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3665>subdued<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>pressed<s%> <S%H1980>heavier<s%> and <S%H7186>heavier<s%> upon <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> they had <S%H3772>destroyed<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
